# AI_Team Python Project

## Project Overview
This is a Python "Hello World" starter project with the following structure:
- `src/` - Source code directory with main.py
- `tests/` - Test directory
- `requirements.txt` - Project dependencies
- `.gitignore` - Standard Python gitignore
- Virtual environment configured (.venv)

## Python Environment
- Python 3.12.10
- Virtual environment: `.venv`
- Command to run Python: `C:/Users/tclark2/repos/AI_Team/.venv/Scripts/python.exe`

## How to Run
```powershell
.\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1
python src/main.py
```

## Development Guidelines
- Add dependencies to requirements.txt
- Keep code in src/ directory
- Add tests in tests/ directory
- Extend the Hello World application as needed
